QuestData.Title: Acquisition: Crystallized Stygia
QuestData.Description:
<This shard of crystal appears to have broken off of one of the massive crystalline structures throughout the area. It thrums with untapped energy.
Ve'nari would likely be interested in any of these shards you come across.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Crystallized Stygia and return it to Ve'nari in the Maw.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Ve'nari at Ve'nari's Refuge.
QuestData.RewardText:
Ah yes, the dormant stygia throughout the Maw will sometimes coalesce into forms such as this.
You were wise to bring this to me, $c.
